body:
Comment 44: 
Work is in progress on this (see golang-dev emails from 0xe2.0x9a.0x9b, for example),
and it remains a high priority for 32-bit systems (notably ARM devices).

No number of stars or comments on this bug will increase its priority, though, as the
number of people qualified to work on this is relatively low and they're mostly already
working on it.
